name: Add new rows to Google Sheets with daily RescueTime summary reports
description: Every time a new daily summary report is created on RescueTime, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15i01eD8pktF2uFupezDEjuqPSA4Mx8wCqQ1ExMjLS3I/edit?usp=sharing)
